P

paint(Graphics) - Method in class system.GameGraphics
This method takes in a Graphics object and paints game objects according to the GameStatus of the input.
paintComponent(Graphics) - Method in class panels.BackgroundPanel
This method takes as input a graphics panel and paints the background on the input panel.
paintComponent(Graphics) - Method in class panels.InstructionsBg
This method takes as input a graphics panel and paints the instructions background on the input panel.
panels - package panels
 
pauseGame() - Static method in class system.GameEngine
This method pauses the game.
Player - Class in system
The class Player and represents all the characteristics of the player.
Player(int, int) - Constructor for class system.Player
This method sets the initial statistics of the player as well as its starting location.
playSound(String, boolean) - Static method in class system.Sound
This method takes in a file path and a boolean loop.
populateMap(int) - Method in class system.GameStatus
This method generates the soft blocks, hard blocks, and enemies of the Bomberman game.
Powerup - Class in system
The class Powerup represents the types of powerups available in the game.
Powerup(int, int) - Constructor for class system.Powerup
This method loads the image of the powerup at its location.
